text:
I don't really know if this invention can be considered as a part of my "domaine spécialisé" because it have nothing to do with information and communication. But I think that as a person with a vigina it touch me more than my communication skills. I would like to talk about period panties. People who have to deal with menstruations all know that it's kinda difficult to deal with it, between headache, uterus pain or even unknow body's parts that reveals themselves by hurting us during 2, 6 or 10 days. On top of that we've to use protections that aren't good and even dangerous for our body because theye're full of toxic products, did you know that there is dioxine in tampons ? We also risk toxic choc wich could make our live in danger. But yes we do have to deal with it, and hopefully some people find solutions in order to protect us from those things. One of them is, as I said before period panties, the principe is simple, it's just a pantie with an absorbal material and coton, we could use it as an alternative, and in my opinion it's a good one. It just depends on people blood flux because panties can't be efficient the same way on the first period day and on the 5th, obviously. This product isn't perfect, that's true but I think it could be a really good alternative and solution. The problem is that if we wanna use one of them during 5 days or more we need almost 6 or 7 panties (for the luckiest). We could try to use 2 of them a day, then clean them for the next day and repeat it for a week if we are courageous (we definitely are) but it still an investissment because panties are not tchip, they cost almost 30 euros per piece.
 In my opinion period panties are a great and usefull invention, they could help a lot of people if they could access to them... The high price make them kinda difficult to buy, but there is associations that can distribute them and I think it's great ! We can't keep putting toxic product on us we needed solutions but the tabou around this subject slowed the researchs and the attention that we deserved.
